content: WhatsApp: Don't forget to send the project update to the client by Friday. Also, need to schedule a meeting with the design team.
Email: The monthly report is due next week. Please review the draft and add your comments. Action item: finalize the budget.
Note: Buy groceries for the week. Remember to check the medicine stock. Plan weekend trip.
WhatsApp: Urgent! The server is down. Need to coordinate with IT and resolve ASAP.
Email: Team, please submit your timesheets by end of day. Don't forget to update the project tracker.
